name: Z Ocean Hotel South Beach

reviews.text: We came to this hotel because of the location and priority club points.
reviews.title: Z Ocean, Miami Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wee automatically upgraded to a terrace room, partial view of ocean.
reviews.title: 'Loved our Stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The ocean view was very partial! However, the room was lovely. There was a nice balcony, a large room with a kitchen area including bar table and stools, a frig and best of all a nespresso machine and coffee. The bathroom was spa style, large shower, separate sinks, just great.
reviews.title: The 3rd time is NOT the charm.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bed was wonderful too.
reviews.title: Great stay on Collins Avenue!
You will not be disappointed
reviews.text: There is not much of a lobby to speak of, a minus really.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I had the pleasure of staying at the Z Ocean Hotel recently, and we were most impressed with the unique rooms and the fine service.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!!

reviews.text: We were upgraded to a Pool Lanai Suite which was a terrific room right on the pool deck. The bed was very comfortable and the room layout and bathroom were great. I would highly recommend paying a little more to upgrade to these rooms.
reviews.title: Great service, great location.

reviews.text: We had drinks at the Breezeway Bar, and the drinks were good. The menu at the Front Porch Cafe was very interesting, but we had dinner reservations elsewhere so we did not get the chance to sample the food at the hotel restaurant.
reviews.title: Fabulous stay

reviews.text: I would highly recommend the Crowne Plaza Z Ocean Hotel for couples and business travelers who need to be in South Beach. The hotel location is terrific, and the valet parking is reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Horrible Service
Unreliable service
reviews.text: Not a great hotel for the money you pay. No complimentary breakfast, you pay for internet service and parking. No air conditioning in the fitness room. It does however have a friendly and helpful staff and the hotel is located in a great location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I luv the view we had I luv the pool an I would have love to meet Mickey cause I read so many good things about him, but Maria R. Was nice an very helpful an making sure we had what we needed. I have also read how they charge ur card for things u don't use or buy an yes but they fix the problem rite away will b back but I want that Penthouse an rooftop view.
reviews.title: We b back an will recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I in july 2012 had our week away from kids and jobs for the year and 4 nights were spent at the Z.
reviews.title: We were very pleased with everything.

reviews.text: Check in was easy. they gave us water upon entrance. we were escorted to our room that was a jacuzzi suite as i aranged. the room was very modern. lots of marble, the shower is big enough for 2 comfortably, the jacuzzi and deck is large and spacious with a curtain where no one can see in. The coffee machine is very neat, the bed very comfortable. My wife and i enjoyed it. I didnt try the tv or internet we didnt want to look at it for a few days. We did eat breakfast there one morning and it was fine and average price for s. beach. We brought in our own booze in our room for obvious reasons. On tuesdays there is a happy hour and they gave some very good ham and cheese brie and some fruit and some booze. It wasnt cheap it was high quality stuff. All staff members we came accross were polite and kind. Went to the beach lots and had no issues with chairs and an umbrella. Very comfy. The room had an umbrella that we used the one day it rained. Every night we went to dinner we would come back and our bed was made and i had wrote on our reservation that this was our anyversery and on our first night when we returned from dinner there was a bottle of champain. Parking is $32 a night as most places in that area. Next year im gonna try to figure out a way to go without a car. The pool area and bar is nice. They also have a hot tub. When we were there a lady was topless at the pool area and many staff members seen her and to me it seemed like it was a common option. So my wife did it also and that was nice for her and i. My wife who can be picky like most of us here and she loved the place and so did i. There was no noise bothering us. My wife have spent 4 years in a row going to south beach and at 4 different hotels and this is our favorite so far. We havent stayed at the one on 17th and collins that starts with a d and ends in a o because there about twice the price as the z any time i looked. There was no comp breakfast it was very clean. Would i go back? if i can get similar rates as this year. On the holiday inn sight you can pay in advance and get about the cheapest rates i have seen. The Z will get first crack at my stay next year.
reviews.title: Bad Experience

reviews.text: If i was dissatisfied id write it but there were no issues or concerns at all on our stay. Dollar for dollar I was satisfied with the price.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I just returned from a 4 night stay at the Z Ocean Hotel. This was my second time staying there but this trip was vastly different and very negative. We had booked a pool suite but they gave us the wrong room, when I went back to reception to ask for the room we had booked they told us it wasn't available and that we'd have to wait a few hours for it. Keep in mind that we arrived the next day due to a flight cancellation and had called the hotel to tell them that we'd be arriving late and to keep our room. They also said we couldn't stay in the room they had just put us in and suggested we wait by the pool. This was totally unacceptable but they did nothing about it except for offer us breakfast. After breakfast the room still wasn't ready...3 hours past and we finally got the room. the manager had said the pull out bed would be turned down in the evening...it wasn't and we called twice and had to wait 3 hours for them to come turn it down. It ended up being broken and the man used the side table to hold it up. Then the curtain rod fell on my head, the internet we purchased didnt work so they suggested i move around until finding a spot that would work, the tv remotes didn't work, there was fire bell testing one of the days and to top it off they ended up over charging us even though we had prepaid for the duration of the trip. It took about 6 phone calls to get this resolved. i found the staff to be clueless except for Mario who was the bartender by the pool. Overall a very negative experience and I will NEVER be staying there again!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Anniversary, some faults over all good stay

reviews.text: Z hotel is a fantastic hotel situated on ocean drive / Collins ave south beach. We stayed in a south beach suite on the third floor the room was amazing real high quality furnishing with a good size balcony . The view from third floor you can't see the beach as its blocked by the condo opposite. If you get a penthouse suite the beach is visible. Staff were ace! Food was excellent and Micky the concierge was a real help! Priority club members get free wifi and resort fee( free quality beach bed service on south beach private area) I didn't pay for the hotel as it was a free priority points trip only had to pay for valet parking and the mini bar which was expensive but I am sure in line with south beach prices! Golf clubs are also in abundance which pleased us ! We also took the duck tour which is a must! I will be back to this hotel for sure could not really fault it!
reviews.title: Florida tour 2012 July

reviews.text: This is a great place to stay!! We are very familiar with South Beach and this location is the absolute best.
reviews.title: Girls Weekend !!!

reviews.text: It's located steps away from the beach. We enjoyed being able to get to beach every morning.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel, great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The resort fee at the hotel does come with 2 chairs and an umbrella. If you need anything extra they charge. For the price of the rooms and the extra fee charged for having a 3rd person you would think it was covered. but overall the beach service makes things easier and nice.
reviews.title: One of the best hotel experiences that I've had

reviews.text: We had a 2nd floor room located on the pool level. The pool was right out our door This loaction was great. Try to get a 2nd floor room If you can't get a rooftop room w/ the jacuzzi.
reviews.title: only 1 Gripe

description: Experience true luxury at our Miami Beach resort, Z Ocean Hotel South Beach. Offering much more than other suite resorts in Miami Beach, Florida, Z Ocean Hotel is ideal for your escape to SoBe.
